definition: senior/of a senior generation/to honor/to respect/honorific/classifier for cannons and statues/ancient wine vessel

sentences.english: The first step is to understand that self-esteem is your opinion of yourself.
sentences.chinese: 第一步是要理解自尊是你對你自己的看法。

sentences.english: Do good strong woman, some women self-esteem is too strong.
sentences.chinese: 女人不要太好強，有的女人自尊心過強。

sentences.english: Former call he now have defiled my only self-esteem.
sentences.chinese: 昔日稱兄道弟的他現在竟玷污了我唯一的自尊。

sentences.english: Your words may injure her pride.
sentences.chinese: 你的話也許會傷她的自尊。

sentences.english: Maintaining a healthy self-esteem is challenge that continues throughout life.
sentences.chinese: 保持健康的自尊心是持續一生的挑戰。

sentences.english: Individuals and society will benefit from the cultivation of independent self-esteem.
sentences.chinese: 無論是個體還是社會都將受益於獨立自尊心的培養。
不能傷害小孩的自尊心。

sentences.english: Students' self-pride will be injured by being laughed at.
sentences.chinese: 學生的自尊心會因被人恥笑而受到傷害。

sentences.english: It wounded his dignity, and he locked himself up in silence.
sentences.chinese: 這傷害了他的自尊，於是他緘口不語了。

sentences.english: The meaning of one's self-respect is expressed through its externalization of which the two main real paths are social practice and communication activity.
sentences.chinese: 人的社會實踐活動和交往活動是自尊外化的現實路徑。

sentences.english: We, the Chinese people, have our national self-respect and pride.
sentences.chinese: 中國人民有自己的民族自尊心和自豪感。

sentences.english: There is nothing you can do that is better than giving them high self-esteem.
sentences.chinese: 沒有什麼比你給他們高度自尊更重要。

sentences.english: What we really need is praise from others to raise our self-esteem.
sentences.chinese: 我們真正需要的來自他人的讚揚以滿足自尊心。

sentences.english: And this feeling of self-respect which I witnessed in him increased my love, my admiration for him.
sentences.chinese: 在他身上看到的自尊加深了我對他的愛慕。

sentences.english: As a self-respecting fighter pilot , that's all I'll say on that subject.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一名有自尊的戰鬥機飛行員，我要說的就這麼多。

sentences.english: He bartered away his pride for material gain.
sentences.chinese: 他爲貪圖物質財富而出賣了他的自尊心。

definition: self-respect/self-love/self-regard/regard for oneself/to cherish one's good name/to take good care of one's health
see 愛面子|爱面子[ai4 mian4 zi5]
to like to look good in the eyes of others/sensitive about how one is regarded by others/proud
